definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: May Amma Bhagavan's blessing bring love and joy into your Relationships.
sentences.chinese: 愿阿妈和巴格万的祝福把爱和喜悦带入你的关系之中。

sentences.english: May the joy of the Sping Festival be with you throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 愿新春佳节的喜悦，伴随您度过新的一年。

sentences.english: You will begin to see that the joy is only in you abiding as your very own Self.
sentences.chinese: 你将开始领悟到喜悦仅仅是驻留于真我中。

sentences.english: In this 8th house will be Jupiter: a planet that often represents joy.
sentences.chinese: 而第八宫的主星是金星，通常代表着喜悦。

sentences.english: His eyes gleamed with relief and joy.
sentences.chinese: 他两眼露出宽慰和喜悦的光芒。

sentences.english: Have I any pleasure at all that the wicked should die?
sentences.chinese: 主耶和华说，恶人死亡，岂是我喜悦的吗。

sentences.english: With a bumper harvest in sight, joy reigned over us.
sentences.chinese: 丰收在望，我们满怀喜悦。

sentences.english: The embarrassment for the government-and the delight of everybody else-remained.
sentences.chinese: 所以政府的尴尬和人们的喜悦互相对峙。

sentences.english: Trembling as the wind blew, which told of his joy of reunion to me by the dense aroma of white lotus.
sentences.chinese: 风颤颤，用白荷酽酽的花香告诉我重逢的喜悦。

sentences.english: This joy is unthinkable divided cheap wow gold from the peasants.
sentences.chinese: 这喜悦是无法想象的低价从农民分谢文东。

sentences.english: Glory to God in the highest heaven, and on earth peace among those whom he favors!
sentences.chinese: 在至高之处荣耀归神，在地上平安归他所喜悦的人。

sentences.english: Lest the LORD see it, and it displease him, and he turn away his wrath from him.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕耶和华看见就不喜悦，将怒气从仇敌身上转过来。

sentences.english: On the journey home, the joy of the farm labourers was beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 还家旅途上，农民工的喜悦心情无法形容。

sentences.english: It is Love to the degree of forgetting oneself in Total Bliss.
sentences.chinese: 它是爱的纯然的喜悦，使自我忘却在其中。

sentences.english: On weekends, I'll catch the morning movie for my visual enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 在周末时，俺都去看早场电影，享受视觉飨宴喜悦。

sentences.english: B: People are still bathing in the afterglow of its selection as the 2008 Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 人们仍然沉浸在成功申办2008年奥运会的喜悦中。

definition: to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
to move emotionally/to stir up (emotions)/to excite
